methods.name: WidgetChild
methods.description: Gets the WidgetChild of the second item slot of the open offer

methods.name: Item
methods.description: Gets the last chosen buy Item based on the ID returned from getLastChosenItemID()

methods.name: GrandExchangeItem
methods.description: Gets an array of the GrandExchangeItems

methods.name: open
methods.description: Opens the nearest Grand Exchange booth using the specified action.

methods.name: isOpen
methods.description: Returns if the Grand Exchange is open or not

methods.name: isGeneralOpen
methods.description: Checks if the general Grand Exchange is open

methods.name: isSellOpen
methods.description: Checks if the selling screen of the Grand Exchange is open

methods.name: getOpenSlot
methods.description: Returns the index of the open slot / offer

methods.name: isBuyOpen
methods.description: Checks if the buying screen of the Grand Exchange is open.

methods.name: isSearchOpen
methods.description: Checks to see if the search item name widget is visible

methods.name: getOfferText
methods.description: Returns the text in the offer screen for whether it says Buy offer or Sell offer

methods.name: openSellScreen
methods.description: Opens the sell screen in the Grand Exchange of the specified slot.

methods.name: openBuyScreen
methods.description: Opens the buy screen in the Grand Exchange of the specified slot.

methods.name: openSlotInterface
methods.description: Opens the general slot interface when a slot has an item in it

methods.name: addSellItem
methods.description: Adds an item to the sell offer

methods.name: searchItem
methods.description: Searches for an item in the buy screen

methods.name: getSearchedItem
methods.description: Gets the currently typed item in the search bar of the GE If no item is typed, widget is not visible, or buy screen is not open it will return "" NOT NULL

methods.name: addBuyItem
methods.description: Adds an item to the buy offer Now checks if there's already an item selected, if it's the wrong item it will attempt to click the back button instead.

methods.name: itemVisible
methods.description: Checks to see if the searched item widget is visible in the item container under the search item text

methods.name: scrollToItem
methods.description: Scrolls to the provided widget in the item search container

methods.name: getItemChildInSearch
methods.description: Gets the widget child of the item you searched for

methods.name: setQuantity
methods.description: Sets the quantity of a buy/sell offer

methods.name: setPrice
methods.description: Sets the price of the current buy/sell offer.

methods.name: readyToEnterAmount
methods.description: Checks to see if the Dialogue can enter input with text "How many do you wish to" see Dialogues.canEnterInput(String) "How many do you wish to"

methods.name: readyToEnterPrice
methods.description: Checks to see if the Dialogue can enter input with text "Set a price for each item:" see Dialogues.canEnterInput(String) "Set a price for each item:"

methods.name: getOfferFirstItemWidget
methods.description: Gets the WidgetChild of the first item slot of the open offer

methods.name: getOfferSecondItemWidget
methods.description: Gets the WidgetChild of the second item slot of the open offer

methods.name: getEnterQuantityButton
methods.description: Gets the WidgetChild of the "Enter Quantity" button

methods.name: getEnterAllButton
methods.description: Gets the Enter All button in the offer screen

methods.name: getCurrentPrice
methods.description: Gets the currently set price of the offer based on the player settings

methods.name: getCurrentAmount
methods.description: Gets the current quantity set based on the player setting for current amount

methods.name: getEnterPriceButton
methods.description: Gets the Enter Price WidgetChild in the offer screen

methods.name: getGuidePriceButton
methods.description: Gets the Guide Price WidgetChild in the offer screen

methods.name: getDecreasePriceFivePercentButton
methods.description: Gets the -5% price WidgetChild in the offer screen

methods.name: getIncreasePriceFivePercentButton
methods.description: Gets the +5% price WidgetChild in the offer screen

methods.name: getDecreasePriceXPercentButton
methods.description: Gets the -X% price WidgetChild in the offer screen

methods.name: getIncreasePriceXPercentButton
methods.description: Gets the +X% price WidgetChild in the offer screen

methods.name: close
methods.description: Closes the GrandExchange screen If close interface with ESC is enabled, will use esc key to close interface

methods.name: getCloseButton
methods.description: Gets the closebutton.

methods.name: sellItem
methods.signature: public static boolean sellItem​(java.lang.String itemName, int amount, int price)
methods.description: Puts an item up for sale in the Grand Exchange

methods.name: buyItem
methods.signature: public static boolean buyItem​(java.lang.String itemName, int amount, int price)
methods.description: Puts in a buy order in the Grand Exchange

methods.name: confirm
methods.description: Confirms the offer in the Grand Exchange

methods.name: goBack
methods.description: Clicks the back button in the offer screen

methods.name: cancelOffer
methods.description: Aborts the current offer in the slot specified in the Grand Exchange Works with buy/sell open or from main ge screen

methods.name: cancelAll
methods.description: Cancels all available offers If inside an offer, will cancel inside the offer, otherwise it will cancel from main screen

methods.name: collect
methods.description: Presses the collect button on the main interface, collects to inventory

methods.name: collectToBank
methods.description: Uses the collect button to collect everything directly to the bank

methods.name: isReadyToCollect
methods.description: Checks if the slot is done selling/buying and is ready to collect. See GrandExchangeItem.isReadyToCollect()

methods.name: slotContainsItem
methods.description: Checks if there's an item in the slot specified

methods.name: getFirstOpenSlot
methods.description: Gets the number of the first open slot

methods.name: isSlotEnabled
methods.description: Checks if the specified slot is enabled.

methods.name: getItems
methods.description: Gets an array of the GrandExchangeItems

methods.name: getCurrentChosenItemID
methods.description: Gets the current chosen Item ID from the Set Up Buy/Sell Offer menu in the GE

methods.name: getLastChosenItemID
methods.description: Gets the Item ID of the last chosen buy item

methods.name: getCurrentChosenItem
methods.description: Gets the Item based on the ID returned from getCurrentChosenItemID()

methods.name: getLastChosenItem
methods.description: Gets the last chosen buy Item based on the ID returned from getLastChosenItemID()

methods.name: getUsedSlots
methods.description: Gets the number of slots that contain an item See slotContainsItem(int)

methods.name: getOpenSlots
methods.description: Gets the number of slots that do not have an item and are enabled

methods.name: contains
methods.description: Checks if your collection contains one item which meets one of the specified ids.

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Gets a GrandExchangeItem that matches one of the given ID's
